name: I Don't Want to Play This Game
name_original: I Don't Want to Play This Game
description:
I Don't Want to Play This Game Move - Arrow Keys     Jump - Z      Dash - X       Rewind - C     

4 worlds, 12 randomly generated levels, lots of deaths and maybe a few spikes. Sounds easy enough.

This is the largest unity game I've made so far (that's not saying much!), and I'd greatly appreciate any and all feedback. If you find that something's broken, unbalanced, or you have any cool ideas to add, please let me know in the comments.

Downloadable version available below.

Credits:

Font - m5x7 by Daniel Linssen https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Background is from Pixel Platformer Art Pack, but either I cant find it or it appears to have been taken down :(

All other pixel art made by me using Piskel.

Playtesting - Manu, Bryler, Jonathan and Ryan thanks guys
